#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int rev(int n);
int main(){

	int n,num1,num2;
	scanf("%d",&n);	
	for(int i = 0; i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&num1);
		scanf("%d",&num2);
		printf("%d\n",rev(rev(num1)+rev(num2)));
	}
	return 0;
}
int rev(int n){
	int r = 0;
	while(n > 0){
		r = r*10+(n%10);
		n/=10;
	}
	return r;
}
